review: The doctor was so patient in listening to every small detail & the way he explained things is beyond extraordinary. He gave us an in depth understanding about what the problem is & what the roadmap to recovery looks like. He comes across as such a wonderfully cheerful person with positive attitude, that it‚Äôs safe to say we are glad we found an amazing doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
*** **** ****** * **** ****** **** *** * He is very good in his diagnosis and treatment. Dr. Fahim is always available to clear all our doubts and even support us with all means.
I had a compressed fracture in Tibia and had to undergo surgery with plates. I was very scared, and he took out time for me to boost my n my family's confidence. He also never gives any extra medicine or surgery suggestions if not very needed. He made sure I get help in terms of ambulance or physiotherapy post surgery. I would also appreciate his reffered physio, Dr. Mahesh - He has made me walk freely n swiftly on stairs without pushing hard within a few days with his perfect exercises. I had 3 physio experiences, and Mahesh is the best one!
I have a few senior orthopedics in my family back home, and they were parallely in connect on my case and they all were fully convinced with Dr. Fahim's treatment and were very happy. They commended his work a lot. 
We believe in Dr. Fahim and would recommend everyone to visit him if they want a doctor who is ************* *** very kind to patients in every way. 
Thank you so much üôè

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Extremely good natured and friendly doctor, responds to all your queries with patience, my 75 year old mother recuperated from hip fracture pretty soon under his care, he took care of her like a son..and ever since we have very good relationship with him

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: ** ***** ** *** ***** Right from the first meeting until the post surgery visits, he was always smiling, kept us honest with the expectations, suggestion on physio, updates on phone with the details of TKR surgery. Fantastic doctor to work with. We are super happy we were able to get his services. I am so thankful to him, he has given my mom and new lease of freedom and mobility. God bless him.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Dr.Fahim is a gem of the person. I visited him for my mother's Knee Replacement. The entire process right from visiting him first time, prep for the surgery, getting the knee replacement done, hospital admission, discharge, and post-operative care for 1 month -- all the phases have been so smooth and nice that I don't have many words to describe it. Dr Fahim is very friendly, advised the best treatment and way forward according to my mom's health condition, and most importantly gave her the confidence that the surgery could be done. My mom has been super happy after getting the surgery done by the doctor just because he has been so supportive and caring about us.  He brings smile to the face of the patients and I think that matters the most during the sickness time. 
I would recommend Dr for anybody and you will find the same what I wrote about it. 

‚ÄúI can't thank you enough for the special, excellent care you have provided and the unique gift of a new knee you gave to my mother.‚Äù Thank you sir.
He listens calmly to the patient and suggests the appropriate approach as well.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,

Doctor had great skill in administering the injections in the knee joint without any pain and that too without any anesthesia.

review: I had an excellent experience during my recent doctor consultation. Dr. Sheikh was not only highly knowledgeable and professional but also very attentive and empathetic. Had consulted Dr Fahim on 3 occasions -- all Orthopaedic (bone) connected... a Tail bone issue, severe knee pain issue & very recently, after a minor fall causing arm injury. Dr Fahim Sheikh is a thorough professional, easily approachable and an efficient listener (to his patients illness concerns and related worries too). His treatment approach makes the patient calm and confidant about the recovery process. During the recent visit, Dr Fahim remembered about my NSAID drug related allergy problems too. That's the connectivity he has with his patients. Thanks doctor Fahim, for all the timely help and services. I would certainly recommend Dr Fahim, for any minor~major orthopaedic related issues/concerns.

I went to Dr Fahim when I had an elbow fracture from a road accident. He was very empathetic and friendly, and patiently guided me during the treatment.  He ensured that only the essential scans and medications are prescribed and minimised the overall treatment cost. 
Doctor was always approachable over phone /WhatsApp and provided his guidance.

Dr Fahim is very friendly and courteous by nature. After talking to him itself I felt a lot better. When I stumbled down and sprained my ankle I was a bit worried about the injury if it was serious. Sir examined it and also recommended an x-ray. After the diagnosis he suggested me medication and very simple treatment plan.  I am feeling a lot better now.. within 4 weeks..Thanks to sir. It was a great experience! I will highly recommend Dr Fahim for any orthopedic issues!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I recently consulted Dr. Fahim for backache. I had been suffering from the pain for a few weeks and it was getting worse. I was worried that it might be something serious, so I decided to see a doctor.Dr. Fahim was very friendly and professional. He took the time to listen to my symptoms and ask me questions about my medical history. He then examined my back and gave me a diagnosis.Dr. Fahim explained the condition to me in detail and told me about the different treatment options. He also answered all of my questions in a clear and concise way. I felt very confident in his ability to help me.Dr. Fahim recommended that I undergo physical therapy. He also prescribed me some medication to help with the pain. I followed his advice and I am now feeling much better.I am very grateful to Dr. Fahim for his help. He is a highly skilled *** ************* doctor who is also very patient and understanding. I would highly recommend him to anyone who is looking for an orthopedic doctor.

review: My mom was treated by Dr.Fahim , it was an emergency as she tripped and fell down and was unable to walk. Doctor was more like a family member listening to all her issues related to pain and was very reassuring with his words. He made 'to the point diagnosis' at the very first visit and treated my mom without any invasive procedure. He is cool and makes sure his patients are confident enough to drive their self on their own. I would highly recommend Dr.Fahim and now he is our family ortho doctor in Bangalore.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had the pleasure of seeing Dr Fahim for a recent health concern and I couldn't be more impressed with the level of care I received. From the moment I walked into the office, I was greeted warmly by the staff and made to feel at ease.

Dr. Fahim was incredibly knowledgeable, professional, and took the time to listen to my concerns and answer all of my questions. Not only did he provide me with a thorough examination, but he also explained his diagnosis and treatment plan in a way that was easy for me to understand.

Throughout the entire process, Dr. Fahim was extremely attentive and made sure that I felt comfortable and informed. I truly appreciate the level of care he provided and would highly recommend him to anyone in need of a skilled and compassionate Orthopaedic.

Overall, my experience with Dr. Fahim was exceptional and I am grateful to have found such a wonderful doctor. Thank you for all that you do!\

review: I was very tensed because of my foot injury. But the cheerfulness of Dr. Fahim and positive behaviour of the doc minimized my stress and tension. review:
I was feeling extreme pain in my left knee, so, I visited Dr Fahim. He diagnosed me and told me that there is broken ACL, and I will require surgery. He explained very clearly the need for surgery and it's procedure. 
I went through surgery under him, and in just 30 days I am back on my feet. He guided me in every stages and steps. 
I would strongly recommend Dr Fahim to everyone for any ortho related issues.
